FACTORY

New paradigms for latent factor estimation.

FACTORY is a project funded by the European Research Council under a Consolidator Grant (2016-2021) and coordinated by Cédric Févotte. The host institution is CNRS and the project takes place at IRIT, Toulouse (France).

News

07/23/16
Post-doc position available

Postdoc position available within project FACTORY (New paradigms for latent factor estimation) to work on matrix factorisation techniques at large for data processing, funded by the ERC under a consolidator grant (2016-2021). | Announcement
